      • getFloor

        public Floor getFloor(int floor,
             java.lang.String building)
               throws FloorNotFoundException
        Fetch a certain Floor from the database
        Parameters:
        floor - The identifying floor for this object
        building - The building name where the floor supposedly resides
        Returns:
        Returns the floor object
        Throws:
        FloorNotFoundException - Exception thrown when the Floor cannot be found in the database

      • getFloorsFromBuilding

        public java.util.List<Floor> getFloorsFromBuilding(java.lang.String building)
        Returns a list of all Floor objects which belong to a certain building of a certain institution
        Parameters:
        building - The building where all floors should be fetched from
        Returns:
        Returns a list of all floors in the given building
